Class Button

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Button
extends java.awt.Rectangle
    Creates button that handle text

        Takes position of button (x,y), its width and height, color of text and background, fontsize of text and text in button. Takes also boolean if text must be centered.

      • Button

        public Button(int x,
              int y,
              int width,
              int height,
              int fontsize,
              java.lang.String text,
              boolean center)
        Takes position of button (x,y), its width and height, fontsize of text and text in button. Takes also boolean if text must be centered. Color of text and background are set to transparent and white.
        Parameters:
        x - x position
        y - y position
        width - width
        height - height
        fontsize - font size
        text - text inside
        center - if text must be center
